information.name: nb_bannettes
information.query: select count(*) as total from bannettes

information.name: nb_bannettes_privees
information.query: SELECT count(id_bannette) as total FROM bannettes WHERE proprio_bannette!=0

information.name: nb_bannettes_publiques_auto
information.query: SELECT count(id_bannette) as total FROM bannettes WHERE proprio_bannette=0 AND bannette_auto=1

information.name: nb_bannettes_publiques_manu
information.query: SELECT count(id_bannette) as total FROM bannettes WHERE proprio_bannette=0 AND bannette_auto=0

information.name: nb_bannettes_privees_auto_diff
information.query: SELECT count(id_bannette) as total FROM bannettes WHERE proprio_bannette!=0 AND bannette_auto=1 AND DATE_ADD(date_last_envoi, INTERVAL periodicite DAY)<now()

information.name: nb_bannettes_publiques_auto_diff
